        │   │   ├── Message.ts
        │   │   ├── MessageDetails.ts
        │   │   ├── Partition.ts
        │   │   ├── Permissions.ts
        │   │   ├── Stats.ts
        │   │   ├── Stream.ts
        │   │   ├── StreamDetails.ts
        │   │   ├── Topic.ts
        │   │   ├── TopicDetails.ts
        │   │   ├── User.ts
        │   │   └── UserDetails.ts
        │   ├── hooks
        │   │   └── useGoPrev.ts
        │   ├── queries.ts
        │   ├── types
        │   │   ├── appRoutes.ts
        │   │   └── utilTypes.ts
        │   └── utils
        │   │   ├── NonNullable.ts
        │   │   ├── addOnKeyDownListener.ts
        │   │   ├── addWindowEventListener.ts
        │   │   ├── arrayMax.ts
        │   │   ├── arraySum.ts
        │   │   ├── asConst.ts
        │   │   ├── base64Utils.ts
        │   │   ├── constants
        │   │       ├── keys.ts
        │   │       ├── numberSizes.ts
        │   │       └── tokens.ts
        │   │   ├── dataHas.ts
        │   │   ├── formatters
        │   │       ├── bytesFormatter.ts
        │   │       ├── dateFormatter.ts
        │   │       └── durationFormatter.ts
        │   │   ├── noTypeCheck.ts
        │   │   ├── parsers.ts
        │   │   ├── persistedStore.ts
        │   │   ├── queryParsers.ts
        │   │   └── utilTypes.ts
        ├── params
        │   └── i32.ts
        ├── routes
        │   ├── +error.svelte
        │   ├── +layout.server.ts
        │   ├── +layout.svelte
        │   ├── api
        │   │   └── proxy
        │   │   │   └── +server.ts
        │   ├── auth
        │   │   ├── +layout.svelte
        │   │   ├── logout
        │   │   │   └── +page.server.ts
        │   │   └── sign-in
        │   │   │   ├── +page.server.ts
        │   │   │   └── +page.svelte
        │   └── dashboard
        │   │   ├── +layout.server.ts
        │   │   ├── +layout.svelte
        │   │   ├── clients
        │   │       └── +page.svelte
        │   │   ├── logs
        │   │       └── +page.svelte
        │   │   ├── overview
        │   │       ├── +page.server.ts
        │   │       └── +page.svelte
        │   │   ├── settings
        │   │       ├── server
        │   │       │   ├── +page.server.ts
        │   │       │   └── +page.svelte
        │   │       ├── terminal
        │   │       │   └── +page.svelte
        │   │       ├── users
        │   │       │   ├── +page.server.ts
        │   │       │   └── +page.svelte
        │   │       └── webUI
        │   │       │   └── +page.svelte
        │   │   └── streams
        │   │       ├── +layout.server.ts
        │   │       ├── +layout.svelte
        │   │       ├── +page.svelte
        │   │       └── [streamId=i32]
        │   │           ├── +page.server.ts
        │   │           ├── +page.svelte
        │   │           └── topics
        │   │               ├── +page.svelte
        │   │               └── [topicId=i32]
        │   │                   ├── +page.server.ts
        │   │                   ├── +page.svelte
        │   │                   └── partitions
        │   │                       └── [partitionId=i32]
        │   │                           ├── +page.svelte
        │   │                           └── messages
        │   │                               ├── +page.server.ts
        │   │                               └── +page.svelte
        └── styles
        │   ├── app.css
        │   ├── tooltip.css
        │   └── variables.css
    ├── static
        ├── favicon.png
        ├── iggy-apache-darkbg.svg
        └── iggy-apache-lightbg.svg
    ├── svelte.config.js
    ├── tsconfig.json
    └── vite.config.ts

/.github/BOT_ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | title: Failure of {{ env.GITHUB_BOT_CONTEXT_STRING }} on {{ date | date('YYYY-MM-DD') }}
 3 | labels: bug
 4 | ---
 5 | 
 6 | ## Job failure report
 7 | 
 8 | - **Workflow Name**: {{ env.GITHUB_WORKFLOW }}
 9 | - **Run ID**: [{{ env.GITHUB_RUN_ID }}](<https://github.com/{{ env.GITHUB_REPOSITORY }}/actions/runs/{{ env.GITHUB_RUN_ID }}>)
10 | 
11 | ### Description
12 | 
13 | A failure occurred in the scheduled run of our {{ env.GITHUB_BOT_CONTEXT_STRING }}.
14 | Please investigate the cause of the failure and take the necessary steps to resolve it.
15 |

 2 | # or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 3 | # distributed with this work for additional information
 4 | # regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
 5 | # to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
 6 | # "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
 7 | # with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
 8 | #

12 | # software distributed under the License is distributed on an
13 | # "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
14 | # KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
15 | # specific language governing permissions and limitations
16 | # under the License.
17 | 
18 | FROM node:24-slim
19 | 
20 | COPY ./foreign/node .
21 | COPY ./bdd/scenarios ./bdd/
22 | 
23 | RUN npm ci
24 | 
25 | USER node
26 | 
27 | CMD ["npm", "run", "test"]
28 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/core/ai/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | # Apache Iggy AI
2 | 
3 | This module contains the AI-related components of the Apache Iggy message streaming infrastructure.
4 | 
5 | Please check the **[MCP Server](https://github.com/apache/iggy/tree/master/core/ai/mcp)** for the details about Iggy MCP (Model Context Protocol) server.
6 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/core/bench/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | # Apache Iggy Bench CLI
2 | 
3 | The interactive Bench CLI allows you to perform various benchmarking on the Apache Iggy server.
4 | 
5 | Iggy Bench CLI can be installed with `cargo install iggy-bench` and then simply accessed by typing `iggy-bench` in your terminal.
6 | 
7 | ![CLI](../../assets/bench.png)
8 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/core/bench/dashboard/frontend/.cargo/config.toml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | # Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
 2 | # or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 3 | # distributed with this work for additional information
 4 | # regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
 5 | # to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
 6 | # "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
 7 | # with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
 8 | #
 9 | #   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
10 | #
11 | # Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
12 | # software distributed under the License is distributed on an
13 | # "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
14 | # KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
15 | # specific language governing permissions and limitations
16 | # under the License.
17 | 
18 | [target.wasm32-unknown-unknown]
19 | rustflags = ["--cfg=getrandom_backend=\"wasm_js\""]
20 |

14 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
15 |  * specific language governing permissions and limitations
16 |  * under the License.
17 |  */
18 |

20 | pub mod poll_messages;

/core/certs/iggy.pfx:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apache/iggy/ab5dd2c38983b730c81197296b149a71b08e82e6/core/certs/iggy.pfx


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/core/cli/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | # Apache Iggy CLI
 2 | 
 3 | The interactive CLI allows you to interact with the Apache Iggy server from the command line.
 4 | 
 5 | This is a great addition to the Web UI, especially for all the developers who prefer using the console tools.
 6 | 
 7 | Iggy CLI can be installed with `cargo install iggy-cli` and then simply accessed by typing `iggy` in your terminal.
 8 | 
 9 | ![CLI](../../assets/cli.png)
10 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/core/common/src/utils/checksum.rs:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | /* Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
 2 |  * or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 3 |  * distributed with this work for additional information
 4 |  * regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
 5 |  * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
 6 |  * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
 7 |  * with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
 8 |  *
 9 |  *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
10 |  *
11 |  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
12 |  * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
13 |  * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
14 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
15 |  * specific language governing permissions and limitations
16 |  * under the License.
17 |  */
18 | 
19 | pub fn calculate_checksum(data: &[u8]) -> u32 {
20 |     crc32fast::hash(data)
21 | }
22 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/core/connectors/sinks/stdout_sink/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | # Stdout Sink
 2 | 
 3 | The Stdout sink allows you to print the data to the standard output (stdout). It can be used for debugging or testing purposes.
 4 | 
 5 | ## Configuration
 6 | 
 7 | - `print_payload`: A boolean value indicating whether to print the payload or not. Defaults to `false`.
 8 | 
 9 | ```toml
10 | [sinks.stdout.config]
11 | print_payload = false
12 | ```
13 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/core/connectors/sources/random_source/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | # Random Source
 2 | 
 3 | The Random Source connector generates random data and sends it to the specified stream(s).
 4 | 
 5 | ## Configuration
 6 | 
 7 | - `interval`: A string representing the interval at which the connector generates random data. Defaults to `"1s"`.
 8 | - `max_count`: An integer representing the maximum number of messages to generate. Defaults to none.
 9 | - `messages_range`: An array of two integers representing the range of amount of messages to generate. Defaults to `[10, 50]`.
10 | - `payload_size`: An integer representing the size in bytes of the `text` field payload to generate. Defaults to `100`.
11 | 
12 | ```toml
13 | [sources.random.config]
14 | interval = "100ms"
15 | max_count = 1000
16 | messages_range = [10, 50]
17 | payload_size = 200
18 | ```
19 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/core/server/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | # Apache Iggy Server
 2 | 
 3 | This is the core server component of Apache Iggy. You can run it directly with `cargo run --bin iggy-server --release` or use the Docker image `apache/iggy:latest` (the `edge` tag is for the latest development version).
 4 | 
 5 | The configuration file is located at [core/configs/server.toml](https://github.com/apache/iggy/blob/master/core/configs/server.toml). You can customize the server settings by modifying this file or by using environment variables e.g. `IGGY_TCP_ADDRESS=0.0.0.0:8090`.
 6 | 
 7 | ![Server](../../assets/server.png)
 8 | 
 9 | ![Architecture](../../assets/iggy_architecture.png)
10 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 8 |  *
 9 |  *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
10 |  *
11 |  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
12 |  * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
13 |  * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
14 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
15 |  * specific language governing permissions and limitations
16 |  * under the License.
17 |  */
18 | 
19 | #[cfg(not(feature = "tokio-console"))]
20 | pub mod logger;
21 | 
22 | #[cfg(feature = "tokio-console")]
23 | pub mod tokio_console;
24 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/examples/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | # Apache Iggy Examples
2 | 
3 | Here you can find the examples of how to use Apache Iggy with the different programming languages. Please note that the features available in each language may vary.
4 | 
5 | ![Sample](../assets/sample.png)
6 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/examples/csharp/src/Basic/Iggy_SDK.Examples.Basic.Consumer/appsettings.json:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | {
 2 |   "Protocol": "tcp",
 3 |   "BaseAddress": "127.0.0.1:8090",
 4 |   "Username": "iggy",
 5 |   "Password": "iggy",
 6 |   "StreamName": "basic-example-stream",
 7 |   "TopicName": "basic-example-topic",
 8 |   "MessageBatchesLimit": 10,
 9 |   "PartitionsCount": 1
10 | }
11 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/examples/csharp/src/Basic/Iggy_SDK.Examples.Basic.Producer/appsettings.json:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | {
 2 |   "Protocol": "tcp",
 3 |   "BaseAddress": "127.0.0.1:8090",
 4 |   "Username": "iggy",
 5 |   "Password": "iggy",
 6 |   "StreamName": "basic-example-stream",
 7 |   "TopicName": "basic-example-topic",
 8 |   "MessageBatchesLimit": 10,
 9 |   "MessagesPerBatch": 10,
10 |   "Interval": "00:00:01",
11 |   "PartitionsCount": 1
12 | }
13 |

/examples/csharp/src/GettingStarted/Iggy_SDK.Examples.GettingStarted.Consumer/Iggy_SDK.Examples.GettingStarted.Consumer.csproj:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ﻿<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
 2 |     <PropertyGroup>
 3 |         <OutputType>Exe</OutputType>
 4 |         <TargetFramework>net8.0</TargetFramework>
 5 |         <ImplicitUsings>enable</ImplicitUsings>
 6 |         <Nullable>enable</Nullable>
 7 |         <WarningsAsErrors>true</WarningsAsErrors>
 8 |     </PropertyGroup>
 9 |     <ItemGroup>
10 |         <ProjectReference Include="..\..\..\..\..\foreign\csharp\Iggy_SDK\Iggy_SDK.csproj"/>
11 |         <ProjectReference Include="..\..\Iggy_SDK.Examples.Shared\Iggy_SDK.Examples.Shared.csproj"/>
12 |     </ItemGroup>
13 |     <ItemGroup>
14 |         <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console" Version="8.0.1"/>
15 |     </ItemGroup>
16 | </Project>
17 |

/foreign/cpp/images/iggy-cpp-build/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | 
2 | # Iggy C++ Build Container
3 | 
4 | This directory contains the source for the pre-built devcontainer referenced in `.devcontainer` at the top level.
5 | 
6 | Under normal circumstances you should not need to modify or load this; it gets build in a dedicated GitHub Action.
7 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/foreign/csharp/Iggy_SDK.Tests.BDD/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ﻿# csharp bdd test
 2 | 
 3 | Scenario are located at [/bdd/scenarios](../../../bdd/scenarios)
 4 | 
 5 | ## env var
 6 | 
 7 | use env var `IGGY_TCP_ADDRESS="host:port"` to set expected server address for bdd test suite.
 8 | 
 9 | ## Run via docker
10 | 
11 | see [/bdd/README.md](../../../bdd/README.md)
12 | 
13 | ## Run locally
14 | 
15 | note: bdd test expect an iggy-server at tcp://127.0.0.1:8090
16 | 
17 | from [/foreign/csharp/Iggy_SDK.Tests.BDD](.) run
18 | 
19 | ```bash
20 | dotnet test
21 | ```
22 | 
23 | ## Troubleshooting
24 | 
25 | Sometimes tests might be run twice or have errors during build.
26 | It's because link to .feature files and problem with generated code.
27 | To fix it, run `dotnet clean`
28 |

/foreign/csharp/Iggy_SDK/Exceptions/ConsumerGroupNotFoundException.cs:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | // // Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
 2 | // // or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 3 | // // distributed with this work for additional information
 4 | // // regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
 5 | // // to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
 6 | // // "License")
 7 | 
 8 | namespace Apache.Iggy.Exceptions;
 9 | 
10 | public class ConsumerGroupNotFoundException : Exception
11 | {
12 |     public string ConsumerGroupName { get; }
13 | 
14 |     public ConsumerGroupNotFoundException(string consumerGroupName) : base($"Consumer Group {consumerGroupName} not found")
15 |     {
16 |         ConsumerGroupName = consumerGroupName;
17 |     }
18 | }
19 |

/foreign/csharp/Shared/Shared.csproj:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
 2 | 
 3 |     <PropertyGroup>
 4 |         <TargetFramework>net8.0</TargetFramework>
 5 |         <ImplicitUsings>enable</ImplicitUsings>
 6 |         <Nullable>enable</Nullable>
 7 |         <AssemblyName>Apache.Iggy.Shared</AssemblyName>
 8 |         <RootNamespace>Apache.Iggy.Shared</RootNamespace>
 9 |     </PropertyGroup>
10 | 
11 |     <ItemGroup>
12 |         <ProjectReference Include="..\Iggy_SDK\Iggy_SDK.csproj" />
13 |     </ItemGroup>
14 | 
15 | </Project>

/foreign/go/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | # Go SDK for Iggy
 2 | 
 3 | Official Go client SDK for [Apache Iggy](https://iggy.apache.org) message streaming.
 4 | 
 5 | The client currently supports TCP protocols with blocking implementation.
 6 | 
 7 | ## Contributing
 8 | 
 9 | Before creating a pull request, please run [golangci-lint](https://golangci-lint.run/welcome/quick-start/) and fix any reported lint issues:
10 | 
11 | ```shell
12 | golangci-lint run
13 | ```
14 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

11 | )

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/foreign/go/samples/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | # Samples
2 | 
3 | Check out our sample projects below:
4 | 
5 | - <a href="https://github.com/apache/iggy/blob/dev/samples/consumer/README.md">Consumer</a> - simple message consumer implementation.
6 | - <a href="https://github.com/apache/iggy/blob/dev/samples/producer/README.md">Producer</a> - simple message producer implementation.
7 |

/foreign/node/cucumber.json:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | {
 2 |   "default": {
 3 |     "loader": [
 4 |       "@swc-node/register/esm-register"
 5 |     ],
 6 |     "import": [
 7 |       "src/bdd/**/*.ts"
 8 |     ],
 9 |     "paths": [
10 |       "../../bdd/**/*.feature",
11 |       "./bdd/**/*.feature"
12 |     ]
13 |   }
14 | }
15 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/foreign/node/src/bdd/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | 
 2 | # Node.js bdd test
 3 | 
 4 | Node.js bdd test are run via cucumber-js.
 5 | scenario are located at [/bdd/scenarios](../../../../bdd/scenarios)
 6 | 
 7 | ## env var
 8 | 
 9 | use env var `IGGY_TCP_ADDRESS="host:port"` to set expected server address for bdd test suite.
10 | 
11 | ## Run via docker
12 | 
13 | see [/bdd/README.md](../../../../bdd/README.md)
14 | 
15 | ## Run locally
16 | 
17 | note: bdd test expect an iggy-server at tcp://127.0.0.1:8090
18 | 
19 | from [/foreign/node](../../) run
20 | 
21 | ```bash
22 | npm ci # if not already done
23 | npm run test:bdd
24 | ```
25 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 7 |  * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
 8 |  * with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
 9 |  *
10 |  *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
11 |  *
12 |  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
13 |  * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
14 |  * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
15 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
16 |  * specific language governing permissions and limitations
17 |  * under the License.
18 |  */
19 | 
20 | 
21 | export * from './create-token.command.js';
22 | export * from './delete-token.command.js';
23 | export * from './get-tokens.command.js';

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/foreign/python/python_examples/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | # Python Examples
 2 | 
 3 | ## 1. Start the Producer
 4 | 
 5 | Navigate to the `python_examples` directory and run:
 6 | 
 7 | ```bash
 8 | python producer.py
 9 | ```
10 | 
11 | ## 2. Start the Consumer
12 | 
13 | Still in the `python_examples` directory, run the consumer using a separate terminal:
14 | 
15 | ```bash
16 | python consumer.py
17 | ```
18 | 
19 | Here's how the output should look (show images of the output):
20 | ![Output Sample](example_screenshot.png)
21 |

 2 | # This supports shell glob matching, relative path matching, and
 3 | # negation (prefixed with !). Only one pattern per line.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/web/src/lib/components/FixedSvelteComponent.svelte:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script lang="ts" generics="T extends ComponentType">
 2 |   import { run } from 'svelte/legacy';
 3 | 
 4 |   import type { ComponentProps, ComponentType, SvelteComponent } from 'svelte';
 5 | 
 6 |   interface Props {
 7 |     component: T;
 8 |     props: ComponentProps<InstanceType<T>>;
 9 |   }
10 | 
11 |   let { component, props }: Props = $props();
12 | 
13 |   let target: HTMLElement | null = $state(null);
14 |   let prevComponent: SvelteComponent | null = $state(null);
15 | 
16 |   run(() => {
17 |     if (component && props && target) {
18 |       if (prevComponent) {
19 |         prevComponent.$destroy();
20 |       }
21 | 
22 |       prevComponent = new component({ target, props, hydrate: true });
23 |     }
24 |   });
25 | </script>
26 | 
27 | <div bind:this={target}></div>
28 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/web/src/lib/components/Loader.svelte:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script lang="ts">
 2 | </script>
 3 | 
 4 | <div class="flex items-baseline gap-1 text-gray-400">
 5 |   {#each [0, 200, 400] as delay (delay)}
 6 |     <span
 7 |       class="loader-animation w-[4px] h-[4px] bg-gray-400 rounded-full"
 8 |       style="animation-delay:{delay}ms "
 9 |     ></span>
10 |   {/each}
11 | </div>
12 | 
13 | <style lang="postcss">
14 |   @reference "../../styles/app.css";
15 |   .loader-animation {
16 |     animation: dots-animation 700ms infinite alternate;
17 |   }
18 | 
19 |   @keyframes dots-animation {
20 |     from {
21 |       opacity: 0.1;
22 |     }
23 | 
24 |     to {
25 |       opacity: 1;
26 |     }
27 |   }
28 | </style>
29 |

 5 |   const darkLogo = '/iggy-apache-darkbg.svg';
 6 | </script>
 7 | 
 8 | <img src={lightLogo} class="{className} block dark:hidden" alt="Apache Iggy" />
 9 | <img src={darkLogo} class="{className} hidden dark:block" alt="Apache Iggy" />

/web/src/lib/components/PreventEventsPropagation.svelte:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script lang="ts">
 2 |   interface Props {
 3 |     children?: import('svelte').Snippet;
 4 |   }
 5 | 
 6 |   let { children }: Props = $props();
 7 |   const stop = (e: Event) => {
 8 |     e.stopPropagation();
 9 |   };
10 | </script>
11 | 
12 | <div onclick={stop} aria-hidden="true">
13 |   {@render children?.()}
14 | </div>
15 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/web/src/lib/components/StopPropagation.svelte:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script lang="ts">
 2 |   import { Keys } from '$lib/utils/constants/keys';
 3 | 
 4 |   interface Props {
 5 |     class?: string | undefined;
 6 |     children?: import('svelte').Snippet;
 7 |   }
 8 | 
 9 |   let { class: className = undefined, children }: Props = $props();
10 | </script>
11 | 
12 | <div
13 |   class={className}
14 |   onclick={(e) => {
15 |     e.stopPropagation();
16 |   }}
17 |   onkeydown={(e) => {
18 |     if (e.key === Keys.ENTER || e.key === Keys.SPACE) {
19 |       e.preventDefault();
20 |       e.stopPropagation();
21 |     }
22 |   }}
23 |   role="button"
24 |   tabindex="0"
25 |   aria-label="Stop propagation"
26 | >
27 |   {@render children?.()}
28 | </div>
29 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/web/src/lib/components/Toggler.svelte:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script lang="ts">
 2 |   import { twMerge } from 'tailwind-merge';
 3 | 
 4 |   interface Props {
 5 |     checked?: boolean;
 6 |   }
 7 | 
 8 |   let { checked = $bindable(false) }: Props = $props();
 9 | </script>
10 | 
11 | <label
12 |   class={twMerge(
13 |     'h-[28px] w-[52px] block rounded-full  relative transition-colors ease-in-out duration-200 hover:cursor-pointer',
14 |     checked ? ' bg-green500' : 'bg-shade-l400 dark:bg-shade-d200'
15 |   )}
16 | >
17 |   <input type="checkbox" class="invisible" bind:checked />
18 | 
19 |   <div
20 |     class={twMerge(
21 |       'absolute left-px top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-[26px] h-[26px] bg-white  rounded-full border border-shade-l700 dark:border-shade-d100 transition-transform ease-in-out duration-200',
22 |       checked && 'translate-x-[24px]'
23 |     )}
24 |   ></div>
25 | </label>
26 |

/web/src/lib/utils/NonNullable.ts:

 1 | /**
 2 |  * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
 3 |  * or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 4 |  * distributed with this work for additional information
 5 |  * regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
 6 |  * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
 7 |  * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
 8 |  * with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
 9 |  *
10 |  *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
11 |  *
12 |  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
13 |  * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
14 |  * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
15 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
16 |  * specific language governing permissions and limitations
17 |  * under the License.
18 |  */
19 | 
20 | export type NonNullable<T> = T extends null | undefined ? never : T;
21 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/web/src/lib/utils/arrayMax.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | /**
 2 |  * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
 3 |  * or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 4 |  * distributed with this work for additional information
 5 |  * regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
 6 |  * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
 7 |  * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
 8 |  * with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
 9 |  *
10 |  *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
11 |  *
12 |  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
13 |  * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
14 |  * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
15 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
16 |  * specific language governing permissions and limitations
17 |  * under the License.
18 |  */
19 | 
20 | export const arrayMax = (array: number[]) => {
21 |   if (array.length === 0) return 0;
22 | 
23 |   return Math.max(...array);
24 | };
25 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/web/src/lib/utils/arraySum.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | /**
 2 |  * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
 3 |  * or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 4 |  * distributed with this work for additional information
 5 |  * regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
 6 |  * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
 7 |  * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
 8 |  * with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
 9 |  *
10 |  *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
11 |  *
12 |  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
13 |  * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
14 |  * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
15 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
16 |  * specific language governing permissions and limitations
17 |  * under the License.
18 |  */
19 | 
20 | export const arraySum = (array: number[]) => {
21 |   return array.reduce((acc, curr) => acc + curr, 0);
22 | };
23 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/web/src/lib/utils/asConst.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | /**
 2 |  * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
 3 |  * or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 4 |  * distributed with this work for additional information
 5 |  * regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file

 8 |  * with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at

10 |  *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

13 |  * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
14 |  * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
15 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
16 |  * specific language governing permissions and limitations
17 |  * under the License.
18 |  */
19 | 
20 | export const asConst = <const T>(value: T) => value;

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/web/src/lib/utils/base64Utils.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | /**
 2 |  * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
 3 |  * or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 4 |  * distributed with this work for additional information
 5 |  * regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
 6 |  * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
 7 |  * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
 8 |  * with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
 9 |  *
10 |  *   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
11 |  *
12 |  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
13 |  * software distributed under the License is distributed on an
14 |  * "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
15 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
16 |  * specific language governing permissions and limitations
17 |  * under the License.
18 |  */
19 | 
20 | export function decodeBase64(str: string): string | null {
21 |   try {
22 |     return atob(str);
23 |   } catch {
24 |     return null;
25 |   }
26 | }
27 | 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/web/src/lib/utils/constants/numberSizes.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | /**
 2 |  * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
 3 |  * or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
 4 |  * distributed with this work for additional information

 6 |  * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
 7 |  * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance

15 |  * KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the

17 |  * under the License.
18 |  */
19 | 
20 | export const numberSizes = {
21 |   max: {
22 |     u32: 4294967295
23 |   }
24 | };

17 |  * under the License.
18 |  */
19 | 
20 | export function match(value: any) {
21 |   return /^-?\d+(\.\d+)?$/.test(value);
22 | }
23 |

/web/src/routes/+error.svelte:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script>
 2 |   import { page } from '$app/state';
 3 | </script>
 4 | 
 5 | {#if page.error && page.error.message === 'Not Found'}
 6 |   Not found
 7 | {:else}
 8 |   Internal Error
 9 | {/if}
10 |

/web/src/routes/dashboard/overview/+page.svelte:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script lang="ts">
 2 |   interface Props {
 3 |     data: any;
 4 |   }
 5 | 
 6 |   let { data }: Props = $props();
 7 | 
 8 |   let statsValues = $derived(
 9 |     Object.values(data.stats).map((val) => val as { name: string; value: string })
10 |   );
11 | </script>
12 | 
13 | <div class="h-full overflow-auto p-10">
14 |   <div class="p-5 w-fit mx-auto rounded-md border dark:border">
15 |     <h1 class="font-semibold text-xl text-color mb-5">System stats</h1>
16 | 
17 |     <div class="mx-auto max-w-2xl text-color grid gap-5 grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 rounded-lg">
18 |       {#each statsValues as { name, value }, idx (idx)}
19 |         <div class="flex gap-2 border rounded-lg p-4 items-center justify-between">
20 |           <span class="text-sm">{name} </span>
21 |           <span class="text-xs text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-300">{value}</span>
22 |         </div>
23 |       {/each}
24 |     </div>
25 |   </div>
26 | </div>
27 |

/web/tsconfig.json:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | {
 2 |   "extends": "./.svelte-kit/tsconfig.json",
 3 |   "compilerOptions": {
 4 |     "allowJs": true,
 5 |     "checkJs": true,
 6 |     "noImplicitAny": false,
 7 |     "esModuleInterop": true,
 8 |     "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
 9 |     "resolveJsonModule": true,
10 |     "skipLibCheck": true,
11 |     "sourceMap": true,
12 |     "strict": true,
13 |     "noErrorTruncation": true
14 |   }
15 |   // Path aliases are handled by https://kit.svelte.dev/docs/configuration#alias
16 |   //
17 |   // If you want to overwrite includes/excludes, make sure to copy over the relevant includes/excludes
18 |   // from the referenced tsconfig.json - TypeScript does not merge them in
19 | }
